title: daiku-alternatives media informations
description: json object containing data about the anime's images sources and/or title overrides

date.description: iso-8601 timestamp for the date at which the image was updated

original.description: link to the original image (from official sources / producers)

archive.description: link to the original image (on an archive website, preferably web.archive.org)

title.description: override for the title of the anime/manga. replaces english title

airingEpisodesOffset.description: offset for currently airing anime episode number
